title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
**Unleash the Power of Play with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu!**

Experience the future of learning with the **Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1)**, the ultimate educational toy that combines math, words, and puzzles into one exciting STEM kit designed for curious minds aged 4-10.

**Why Choose Plugo STEM Pack?**

- **Engaging AR Technology**: Transform your child’s playtime into a world of interactive learning with augmented reality that makes counting, spelling, and problem-solving fun.
- **3-in-1 Versatility**: Master math, vocabulary, and puzzles with the innovative Count, Letters, and Link kits. Each kit is designed to enhance different aspects of learning.
- **Interactive Games & Levels**: With over 750 unique levels across 15 interactive games, the Plugo app adapts to your child’s skill level, ensuring they learn from pre-K to Grade 4.
- **No In-App Purchases**: Enjoy unlimited access to all educational content without any hidden costs.
- **Perfect for Boys & Girls**: Encourage your little one’s natural curiosity and creativity with a gift that’s suitable for both boys and girls.
- **Magnetic Blocks & Puzzles**: Develop fine-motor skills with engaging magnetic blocks and stimulating puzzles designed to build problem-solving abilities.
- **Parental Peace of Mind**: Our app is compatible with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tablets, and Amazon Fire devices, making it easy to set up and keep your child engaged.

**What’s Included in the Box?**

- 3 Plugo STEM Kits: Count, Letters, and Link
- 1 Plugo Gamepad with embedded magnets and a foldable game mat

**Compatible Devices**

- **iOS Devices**: iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above (iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9” not supported)
- **Android Devices**: Minimum OS version 8, 2GB RAM, front camera at the top centre (10-inch screen tablets and above not supported)
- **Amazon Fire Devices**: 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020

**Get Ready for a World of Learning!**

The **Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1)** is not just a toy; it’s a gateway to a world where learning is fun, and every child can discover the joy of STEM. Order now and watch your child’s confidence and skills soar!
